thread.title: 'Pyaar Ka Punchnama 2' male cast to stage a unique protest
thread.title_full: 'Pyaar Ka Punchnama 2' male cast to stage a unique protest - Entertainment

author: The Hitlist Team
title: 'Pyaar Ka Punchnama 2' male cast to stage a unique protest
text:
They refer to it as Mohabbat Mukti Morcha â€” a protest against romance. As part of the promotions for their upcoming film, 'Pyaar Ka Punchnama 2', the film's male leads Kartik Aaryan, Omkar Kapoor and Sunny Singh along with filmmakers Abhishek Pathak and Luv Ranjan, will stage a rally on October 9 in Juhu.

Kartik Aaryan, Omkar Kapoor and Sunny Singh with Nushrat Bharucha, Sonalli Sehgall and Ishita Sharma in 'Pyaar Ka Punchnama 2' 
They will walk with a dog leash around their necks, their hands in chains while a three-foot soft toy teddy will be burnt. All this because the film deals with the battle of the sexes.
